text: FACSAT-1 is the second Colombian-made satellite sent to orbit, and the first on behalf of the Colombian Air Force. ==Characteristics== FACSAT-1 is a nanosatellite, capable of taking images with a resolution of 30 meters per pixel. ==Manufacture== The contract to manufacture FACSAT-1 was awarded to GomSpace A/S in 2014. ==Launch== FACSAT-1 was launched on November 29, 2018 at 04:15 UTC in the PSLV-C43 rocket of the Indian Space Agency (ISRO). ==See also== * Libertad 1 ==References== Category:Earth imaging satellites Category:Satellites of Colombia Category:2018 in Colombia Category:2018 in spaceflight
title: FACSAT-1
